title: seriffed top of t?
content:
Thought I’d share a work by my favorite young up-and-coming letterer. Seems like an interesting take on a Didone letter, with some innovative serif placement...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023934im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/misty_5352.jpg)

 [‹ who/what is www.fontshop.se?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023934/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40117 "Go to previous forum topic") [Monotype vs. Linotype ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023934/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40147 "Go to next forum topic")
author: eliason

comments.content: Might be cool for a display cut, but could cause problems at text size regarding confusion with the lower case \_el\_
